## Code Structure in folder scr/

Utilities.R
    'load.data'           load data 
    'split.pm'            split pm2.5 into baseline and wildfire contribution 
    'create.lag.value'    create lags for pm2.5 or baseline or wildfire contribution 
    'trans.coef'          transform coefficients in Poisson model 
        
Model.R
    'model' regression on pm2.5 values; 
        works for sinple or multiple lags
        w/ or w/o mobility data 

ExeSingleLagModel.R 
      OneBand     singleLag21     wMobility      (for cases and deaths, various combinations degree of freedom)
      OneBand     singleLag21     -              (for cases and deaths, various combinations degree of freedom)
 
ExeDistLagModel.R 
      OneBand     MultiLag21      wMobility      (for cases and deaths, one combination degree of freedom)
      OneBand     MultiLag21      -              (for cases and deaths, one combination degree of freedom)

Vis1.R
    x-axis is lag number
    
Vis2.R
    x-axis is degree of freedom number

Vis3.R

SummarizeData.R

## Tests.R

## some exploration and visualization 
    combine.R (clean data!!!)
    GoogleMobility.R
    HazardSmokeSystem.R
    SummarizeData.R
    calfire.R
    Exploratory...
    (total)TestCount.R
    
## Data Description 

# https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog/IDAHO_EPSCOR_TERRACLIMATE#bands
# https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog/IDAHO_EPSCOR_GRIDMET?hl=es#bands
Name	Units	Min	  Max	    Description
pr	  mm	  0*	  7245*   Precipitation accumulation
srad	W/m^2 0*	  5477*	  Downward surface shortwave radiation
tmmx	K	    -670*	576*	  Maximum temperature
rmax	%	    1.05*	100*    Maximum relative humidity
sph	  kg/kg	0*	  0.02*   Specific humidity

Name	      Units	    Min	  Max	    Description
cases       people                  Confirmed COVID cases            
deaths      people                  Deaths of COVID
population  people
pm25        ug/m^3
